nodes.text: The Bartyn mansion was the home of the Bartyn family in the planet Lamaredd, which was almost completely controlled by them. It was located in Mt. Hugo, the highest mountain of the Krakana's Maw range, near the city of Bartyn's Landing.

Besides the city itself, the Bartyn mansion was the biggest artificial structure in the planet. It was built with red wood from local vaffu tree as if it was the stronghold of a warlord, although it used advanced technology and Outer Rim Oreworks guards for defense. It was also heavily decorated without being vulgar.
As of c. 29 BBY, it was the residence of ORO Administrator Guther Bartyn.
